title: Unable to Connect to PvP Network
body: I don't know what is going on but every once in awhile i will get this message at the login screen. Some days it works and others it doesn't. It has always been the same computer and same network I don't know if it's a problem on my end or not. Does anyone have any solutions??

replies.body:
The specific issue with the Login Screen displaying errors was actually an issue on our end earlier this weekend around Saturday.  We started to identify the issue and believe that we have resolved it moving forward.  

Are you still experiencing errors when attempting to login?  Are you completely blocked from doing so, or are you able to login normally after attempting to a couple of times?
Same here. Not only is the Store slow, but also the Game Lobby.
